description:
Build a framework for defining and seeding test data with support for versioned datasets, relationships, and environment-specific configurations.

**Rationale:** Manual test data setup is error-prone and time-consuming. Automated seeding ensures consistent, repeatable test scenarios across environments.
title: Automated Test Data Seeding
